option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: * Many, many optimizations * Reduced chunk size * Fixed possible deadlocks

MESSAGE.value: Cleaning up.
Split chunk mesh from the actual chunk. Optimized rendering accordingly.
Fixed billboards and stone now shows up more frequently.
Cleanup and comments.
Improved player "bobbing".
Fixed chunky player view pitching.

* Optimized the way chunks are updated and rendered * Improved terrain * Improved chunk shader * Changed clouds a bit * Changed overall lighting tints a bit * Nights are no more completely dark * Shadows are no more completely dark * And some more minor changes...
* Improved terrain * Readded lake generation * "Improved" stone layer * Changed the way forests are generated * Some more optimizations...
* Some minor overall changes * Fixed a bug when loading visible chunks
* Cleanup and project restructuring
* Fixed run scripts
* Fixed color of grass blocks
* Optimized caching (chunks are no longer saved to disk in the render thread)
* Reduced memory overhead * No more blocking of the render thread
* Minor optimizations and tweaks
* Replaced display lists with vertex buffer objects * Chunks are now optimized on-the-fly (duplicate vertices get eliminated)
* Added frustum culling * Optimized rendering and updating accordingly
* Overhauled caching and rendering * Many performance improvements * Fixed rare deadlock (finally) * Some more minor improvements * Added missing files
* Searching for a bug
* Many, many optimizations * Reduced chunk size * Fixed possible deadlocks
